overview: Three sociology students need a thesis to write about in order to receive their master degrees. They decide upon writing about what the gays are doing in the community today, a simple yet obvious question and answer. The only way to write about a topic is for them to receive some first-hand experience â€” and they do. This movie contains the complete 1976 film "Workin' It Hard" with newly created scenes at the beginning and end.
title: His Master's Touch
